Segment.name: ITA
Segment.comment: To specify allowances, charges, or services

Field.comment: Code which indicates an allowance or charge for the service specified

Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeMethodOfHandlingCode
Field.comment: Code indicating method of handling for an allowance or charge

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeNumber
Field.comment: The number assigned by a vendor referencing an allowance, promotion, deal or charge

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeRate
Field.comment: Allowance or Charge Rate per Unit

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeTotalAmount
Field.comment: Total dollar amount for the allowance or charge

Field.name: AllowanceChargePercentQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating on what basis allowance or charge percent is calculated

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: SpecialChargeOrAllowanceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of special charge or allowance

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: RelationshipCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the relationship between entities

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken
